verbose_text: The second one was related to the unique ability of EBV to establish a latent infection in B cells and, through expression of viral latency proteins, to drive B-cell proliferation and activation, these features being compatible with the presence of expanded B cell clones and Ig producing plasma cells in the MS brain.
evidence: one was related to the unique ability of EBV to establish a latent infection in B cells and, through expression of viral latency proteins, to drive B-cell proliferation
